name: Austrian Aviation Training
about: Austrian Aviation Training is a medium-sized flight school offering modular pilot training programs, including the Advanced Pilots 0 - fATPL course. With the designation AT.ATO.969, we are committed to providing high-quality training tailored to individual needs. Our programs are designed to equip students with the necessary skills and knowledge to achieve their aviation goals. Our experienced instructors and modern training facilities ensure a comprehensive learning environment. We focus on delivering personalized training, allowing students to progress at their own pace. Whether you are starting your aviation journey or advancing your existing skills, Austrian Aviation Training is dedicated to helping you succeed in your flying career.
